sourceDesc.p: Created by members of CWRC/CSÉC unless otherwise noted.

head.title: The Ṭurra (Commentary) of Ghadīja Bint al-ʿĀqil al-Daymāniyya (d. 1250/1834-5) on al-Sullam al-murawnaq (The Adorned Ladder) of ʿAbd al-Raḥmān al-Akhḍarī (919–53/1513–46 or 919–83/1513–75) on the art of logic.
Translation of Matn and Ṭurraطرة and احمرار - red marginalia - critical marginal notes by David OwenAll rights reserved

lg.l: 1. Praise be to God: He3The translation follows the gender of the Arabic pronoun closely who has brought forth The ends of thinking for minds of wit
